duties_responsibilities.duty: Counsel students in all aspects of center life, including personal, social, vocational, and educational training.
Assess and evaluate students on formal and informal levels, providing assistance in continuing education and connecting with community services.
Document student contact counseling sessions and provide assistance in setting short and long-term goals, identifying strengths and career challenges.
Complete ongoing assignments given by the counseling and program administrative personnel, submitting written student reports and evaluations as needed.
Conduct intake interviews, monitor attendance, address conduct issues, and arrange interventions to address below expectations performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, including 15 semester hours of Social Sciences or related area. One year’s experience in a counseling capacity or related field.
